Tutorial: Using the camera API In this tutorial you create application which allows you to make a photo via the front camera and to save it on the SD card.
If you using the Android emulator ensure that you configured the camera and that you added an SD card during the creation of the your Android virtual device.
Create a new Android project called _de.vogella.camera.api_ with an _activity_ called `MakePhotoActivity` .
Add the `android.permission.CAMERA` permission to access your camera and the `android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE` to be able to write to the SD card to your AndroidManifest.xml file.
